评论详情: Really loved these a lot! The pants are a little tight on your belly, and the material doesn’t have a lot of flexibility it’s very taught but it’s good quality! The long is VERY LONG. I’m 5’7” and they were a couple inches too long so keep that in mind, but they were nice! Super cute color

So i ordered my size based on the chart, these have a lot of give to them, and i wish i would have honestly ordered a size down [i would send them back but i need them immediatelyfor work]. Im only in my second trimester so i will keep them as i know im not done growing. I ordered a 3xl and they fit ok in the hips are slightly baggy in the buttocks area, but are entirely too long for someone my height [5'2"] and are definitely more for someone of an average height or slightly taller than average. Overall they are comfortable, breathable, soft,  however I will need to have them altered by about an good inch or two.
I bought my 2x and they was too big so size down otherwise I loved the scrubs
Pants were so comfortable. Worth the money
Not true to size at all. Not even close. Too small in the thigh.

I bought this scrubs at the beginning of my pregnancy and used it whole 40 weeks lol I also had mandala one but this is my favourite bc ıt strechy around the belly so I was pretty comfartable. It started to get little tight towards the end but so normal bc it was xs size lol I am 5’5. I did not want to buy another one for few weeks and just used it whole 40 weeks 3 times a week! It is difficult to find that color so I was lucky and recommend this product. I hope this review helps to new moms like me!
Nice quality

These are basically like my regular work scrubs just maternity. I’m 240lbs at 8 months pregnant and there’s def still room to grow. I probably could’ve sized down but overall these are great, they are a bit long but I did order the tall and I’m 5’5. I recommend these to anyone! I would buy another pair

I am tall and these fit great. I normally love figs but opted for these during my pregnancy to save money. I would recommend this to anyone. I did size down in the tall size for reference (small) and did a medium around 30ish weeks.
Fit like a garbage bag
I sized up when I should not of but they are comfy. Fits good. I do wish they have pockets for my hands but that's ok.

I am about 6 months along and these fit nicely. I do recommend getting the petite if you are short. I am 5’2” but they didn’t have the petite so I cut the bottoms, recommended hemming. They are baggy and no issues with the tummy elastic. You only have the side pockets as well, no waist pockets.

评论概述: Has pockets, comfy but kinda baggy
评论详情: Pre-pregnancy I'm a regular medium and these worked for me after 20 wks. I like that it has extra pockets compared to other brands, but they are kinda baggy which sucks because I don't like jogger styles which seems to be most available. Very comfortable at work now that I've given up wearing my regular scrubs.
Fits perfect and material was great
Bought as a gift.  They love them
El pantalón llegó lleno de pelos de gatos,completamente en desacuerdo con el,lo que les cuento es poco para la cantidad de pelos de gato que tenía,Un asco
Odd fit and very baggy in the front. Material is scratchy and caused chafing.

评论概述: Not a lot of material for bump
评论详情: Better than wearing regular pants but too much pressure along the tummy!! Did not cover my bump properly and I had a very small bump. The only time they fit was when I sat down. Vet techs don’t sit.. I had to break the stitching to get relief. Length was great. Thighs fit, according to size chart
Pants definitely run on the bigger size. Cut was decent. Lint stuck on very easily. Found myself having to lint roll prior to each use.
Excellent
These were my most comfortable scrub pants the whole time I was pregnant
Ordered these I'm size medium.  Fit perfect at 26/27 weeks. May have to size up if my butt gets. Very flattering and lots of compliments on them at work.
I used them during my third trimester. They are comfy but run large and are long.
These pants are very comfy and light. Love them. I sized down and it fits perfectly. I am currently 5 months pregnant.

评论概述: Did not get my full refund
评论详情: I returned 2 of my maternity scrub bottoms and only got a refund on 1:(. They were just too big, definitely size down. I'm Normally a medium, but should have done a small for reference.
Good material but weird fit. Fits good on the bump but too low/loose in the back so they don't stay up well

评论概述: Awkward fit. Wish I could return but already washed them
评论详情: I’m 5f6i, 130lbs- ordered a small as I usually would and these are short on me, they fit like a petite but they aren’t petite. The legs are awkwardly baggy/big and the stretchy belly part of the pants goes so low, like down to the crotch almost so you can see it while wearing your scrub top. And the top of the stretchy band is thick/uncomfortable and tight, it leaves a mark on my belly and I’m hardly even showing yet. These pants are somehow too big and also too small all at once. I love Cherokee but would not recommend these pants.
These were waaaaay to big. I got a size large and they feel like 3xl. I'm 5'6 158 lb. I was gonna return them but missed the window. I may see if I can just alter them myself.
Legs are ginormous and band a little tight on the belly. Did not work for me

I had a hard time finding tall maternity scrubs, but these did the job. They are soft and somewhat stretchy. They fit wonderfully over my 6.5 month bump. They match the other Cherokee tops incase you aren’t ready for the maternity top yet.
A little baggy I would recommend sizing down
Super comfortable . Great stretch wouldn’t have made it through a work day without them.
I ordered a 2 tall. My favorite thing about these pants is that they are actually TALL. So far these are the best fitting maternity pants I’ve bought. Will be purchasing more colors
I am 5ft 5in, 178lbs and 20 weeks pregnant and a large was way to big. Size down!

评论概述: Too big, everything sticks to material
评论详情: Not a fan of this brand. I’m a size medium in every brand. I bought mediums and they’re too big still. I can never get all the dog and human hair off the material! The pants constantly fall down. Material is not breathable either
Fits amazing and perfectly on my body shape. I love it. Looks great and the color still the same after so many time washing it. Doesn’t shrink.

评论概述: True to size - great for petites
评论详情: These are great maternity scrubs and the perfect length! I’m 5’1” with 36” hip and size 0-2 pre-pregnancy. The XS petite fits perfectly. The legs are not too baggy. The stretchy panel is a bit loose now at 19 weeks but will be great for when I’m further along.
These were some of the strangest fitting maternity scrubs that I’ve tried on. The crotch hangs down super low and the belly band sags constantly. Not a fan and had to return them.
It runs big
These were super comfortable and grew with me as I got bigger in my pregnancy. Super light weight and stretchy easy to wash and doesn't leave pillies.
These saved me at my job.  So comfy and love that they came in short sizes.  Will be ordering a 2nd pair.
these run big. ordered my true pre-pregnancy size of medium but a small would have worked better. quality is okay, fit is a little awkward.

They have a really good amount of stretch. So you will be able to wear them all through out your pregnancy, just make sure to get one size up to ensure they last. At least thats what I did. But DEF recommend to nurses and health care workers that are looking for scrubs!

Definitely not the most flattering scrubs (I got a pair of maternity joggers that I ended up preferring), but good quality. I’m used to having front pockets so that threw me off but didn’t take long to adjust. The belly band would slide down (especially if I let my pockets get too heavy) which was a little annoying but also most maternity pants will do that. Overall I was happy with the fit (I didn’t have to size up so that was nice) and they got me through the pregnancy!
Good Material and they fit good for maternity fit.
Fits like an XL. U comfortable and long
Love these! Size down. They run large.
Great fit! Great quality.
Good quality,recommended to the future mommy

Exactly what I needed for work. I couldn't find the color I needed for work since I needed a specific one and the other places I've found them were so expensive.  Found these for a cheaper price and the exact brand/color I needed. Definitely worth getting since it was perfect for work and very comfy.
These pants fit well and are comfortable enough but anyone working in vet med should avoid. They pick up hair and dust like they are made of tape and have 0 stretch
Although these are maturity pants, I am not pregnant. I am a nurse whom sits at a computer 8 hours a day. These pants allow me comfort.

So the fabric is really comfy.  But, I feel like I have to keep pulling them up because they ride down and the crotch area is so baggy it makes my bump look weird.  The elastic on the top is kind of tight like others have said.  It’s hard to make these look flattering.

I typically wear a large and the large fits great. I'm 25 weeks and have room to grow. I'm 5'4 and they are just a little long on me but not an issue. I was happy with them until I noticed a hole/tear on the thigh before a wash.

Pretty decent maternity scrubs; slightly overpriced for the product though IMO. Purchased both green and black. Purchased in size medium and have been able to use from 20-31 weeks so far and they still fit pretty well. The belly band in the front comes up over my bump but you pretty much have to rely on it staying put with your bump as opposed to having good stretch/elastic. It does stay put pretty well now that my bump is bigger. But the band definitely slides down pretty low in the back. Has a pocket on the butt and then cargo pockets on both sides.
Hard material and I itchy quality with no stretch often feels like the hem to the pants are giving you a wedgie
Runs large. I bought pre pregnancy size (medium) & they fit great. Size reference 5’9 190
Scrubs are already like pajamas, these grew with my baby belly and fit well the whole pregnancy. Super comfy and covered tummy without being too hot or tight.
Well made product.
The hip allowance was cut to big for my standard size hips. (I had ordered a small)
Bought these for my bestie, and she loves them, super comfy for nurse work, and the color was perfect for her hospital.
Product runs way to big
I wore these during clinicals and they were perfect. When 5 months rolled around, I knew it was time to size up as belly area became too tight for my liking.
Good quality pants, but they aren’t meant for early or mid pregnancy unless you are carrying big. I would also order a size down from your normal so they don’t feel so baggy.

评论概述: order same size as regular pants
评论详情: Too big for me at 30 weeks pregnant. I ordered a size up as my regular scrub pants are a medium. Returned and got a medium in the pregnancy scrub pants and they work much better with room to still grow.
Great soft breathable material. So comfortable and stretchy.
I am happy enough with them. They fit well and cover my belly. The material does feel thin and cheap.
These pants are super comfortable for a pregnancy!  I bought my normal size, small, and have been able to use them my entire pregnancy!  The belly band stretches perfectly to fit your growing bump!

The crotch area of the pants have a lot of extra space. It fits great over a pregnant belly until about 8 months. You are able to fold the waistband down to go under your belly when it does not fit over your belly. Needs a petite option for length.
Fits good on me. I am 5ft and 6 months pregnant..
They aren't comfortable to me. It feels like when I walk they slide down. I feel like I'm walking around the hospital sagging.

These fit me everywhere but the tops of these cut into my belly a bit. I took the top and pulled until the stitching popped and it loosened them enough you can’t see them cutting into my belly thru my tops lol
I usually wear a tall in scrub pants but these were extremely long.
Long, roomy crotch and tight in the thighs. Absolutely no stretch to the pant. Meh.
Impressed by the brands sturdy material. Feels like lasting quality.
Comfy enough to wear 12 hours a day. Great pockets
Runs a little big in belly and in length. Not as many pockets as I’m used to but it did it’s job for the few months that I needed them. I’ll use them for the next pregnancy too.
I just assumed I should size up so I went with a large when normally I am a med.  Well I should have went with a small!  The large is way to big!

No creí esa advertencia, buena calidad igual lo utilicé en mi maternidad pero si usted es M en la vida real sin estar embarazada, pida un M. Yo pedí un L y mido 1,80mt y llegué a pesar 82 kilos de gemelos y me quedaba volando pero utilizable. Si retrocediera el tiempo habría pedido un M

These are great quality. I work a very active job and they hold up extremely well. They fit perfectly, are breathable and light, and surprisingly they haven't torn or started to thin in the inner thighs at all.
I loved how this fit, but I unfortunately I got a rash on my thighs from the type of material that was used.
I love these scrubs!

I figured as I got bigger in my pregnancy I could just order bigger tops but don't forget about pants. You could get a larger size but they are going to look baggy. I feel like these maternity pants are worth it. I don't have any pressure under my stomach when I sit down now. And they look like normal pants when my shirt is pulled down. They are really comfortable and I also feel comfort with the spandex over my stomach. It's not restricting at all. I'm really happy I chose to buy them.

I am 5’5” and weigh 190lbs. These fit perfect with room to grow. I have mid sized thighs and they are just a tad tight. I would not recommend for large things.  Their is a band to help keep them up at top. Overall they are comfortable.
Love these I wear them everyday during my pregnancy for work.

These are not easy clean. Everything sticks to these pants. They need to be a different material. Also I have a short torso and I feel like the maternity band part doesn’t come up high enough, but everyone is different.

I read all the reviews and ordered small instead of medium. They fit nice! I also bought petite length and at 5 foot tall they are actually the perfect length. Seem comfy do far but I haven't worn them at work yet. Belly area has a nice area to grow into!

Out of all the maternity scrub pants I ordered to try, these fit the best but they aren’t the most flattering. Too much extra fabric in the hips, give a square but appearance. They stretch to an extent but if you like really stretchy material then you won’t like them. These were the only scrub bottoms I ordered that had thicker material, not see through. They show lent really badly. Overall, not terrible not the best.

I just got them in the mail, I had bought some discount ones at an online retailer because I wanted to save money. I was highly disappointed. I should have just bought these and I would have been more comfortable before now. These are wonderful. Just like my regular scrubs, but with a tummy. I love them! I'll definitely enjoy them for the next few months. I will probably buy one or two more! Thanks Cherokee!
I was able to wear my normal scrubs till I hit the 5 month mark. Then, it just became uncomfortable. These pants are not only very comfortable but they look very nice! Very happy with these.
These pants are very uncomfortable and do not allow for much growth with a growing belly. Disappointed. Legs fit fine, but upper part for belly became too small within a month.

A little on the short side too if you are a tall girl

So comfortable! My normal scrubs were getting too tight with a growing baby, these are soft, loose fitting on the bump (for now) and we’re affordable. I have bought multiple pairs and am very happy with the quality.
I usually wear a size 12 pants these run very big.
At seven months pregnant I finally bought maternity scrubs. I was very disappointed. They had absolutely no stretch and so uncomfortable.
I ordered a Large; it fit me so big but eventually I grew into the pants but still a little lose at 36 weeks pregnant
I wish I would have sized down. they are so comfortable but way too big to fit me so I'm hopingI grow into them as my belly grows

评论概述: Runs big but it will do
评论详情: I am 25 weeks along. I first ordered the small and they were too large around the groin area. The xsmall fits better with still room to grow. The bottom are slightly wider than expected but as long as they’re not touching the ground I’m okay with it.
These were quality comfort but size was a bit too big. Had to wear tank top underneath to help hold it up, even at full term. I would also change pocket placement but that’s a personal preference
Run just slightly large in my opinion but over all good for the cost. I don’t love the material but I knew that when I ordered them. Will definitely last me thru the end of my pregnancy
